name: Burger cat!
description: Burger cat is a game I made in a weekend to commemorate flash. although its made in html i tred my best to reminisce the flash games of the ealy 2000s. mouse drawn graphics and sfx i found on websites from 2009, plus a track from waxterk! play through 3 short levels to feed this dude and unlock a secret card at the end of each level! WASD to move, its that simple, move to one of 5 drop points and catch the falling burgers. lmk if you find any bugs and make sure this dude isnt hungry! huge thanks to waxterk for letting me use his track, check him out: https://waxterk.newgrounds.com/audio, real good cat owner right there.
